lead_paragraph: “We must tell the truth,” President Tsai Ing-wen said. “And then, most importantly, the government must genuinely reflect on this past.”

headline.print_headline: Taiwan Apologizes to Aborigines for Injustices
headline.main: Taiwan’s President Apologizes to Aborigines for Centuries of Injustice

snippet: “We must tell the truth,” President Tsai Ing-wen said. “And then, most importantly, the government must genuinely reflect on this past.”...
abstract: Pres Tsai lng-wen iof Taiwan apologizes to aboriginal peoples for centuries of injustices.
